liquidityFee__bak: VipSwap platform transaction fee is 0.3%, of which 0.2% will be rewarded to liquidity providers, and the remaining 0.15% will be rewarded to all users who create and join EVip in the UBI1.0 stage (specific rules will be announced before UBI1.0 goes online).

joinTheFollowing: You will Join the following EVip:
bonus: NVip Bonus: Initially, the airdrop weight of each address is 1 by default, but each address can get the airdrop bonus by expanding its NVip. NVip contains the Parent Block Address(PBA) and Uncle Block Address(UBA). The specific addition method is as follows, Each PBA can add 0.3 airdrop weight to the account, and the maximum added weight is 1.5 :Each UBA can add 0.1 airdrop weight to the account, and the maximum added weight is 2.5;
users: When EVip users (including users who create and join EVip) participate in liquidity mining, in addition to gaining their own LPT output, they can also get EVip bonus. By join EVip, users can share the liquidity mining income without LPT.The liquidity mining power bonus of the EVip users is related to his/her own LPT computing power, the LPT computing power of all EVip members, and the LPT computing power of all users in NVip.
eVipreward:
When EVip users (including users who create and join EVip) participate in liquidity mining, in addition to gaining their own LPT output, they can also get EVip bonus. By join EVip, users can share the liquidity mining income without LPT. 
The liquidity mining power bonus of the EVip users is related to his/her own LPT computing power, the LPT computing power of all EVip members, and the LPT computing power of all users in NVip.
addLiquidityTip: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
removingPollTip: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.
toolForFind: Use this tool to find pairs that don't automatically appear in the interface.
createNVipTip: Create your NVip to generate an invitation link or view your NVip details.
connectToFind: Connect to a wallet to find pools
selectToFindLiquidity: Select a token to find your liquidity
bestPrice: Routing through these tokens resulted in the best price for your trade.
enterNameEVip: Please enter the name of the EVip you want to create:
createEVipPlaceholder: Support Chinese, English, numbers, up to 6 characters
stakingTip:
Stake your LP Tokens to join VipSwap liquidity mining, and the rewards of liquidity mining will be issued in the form of platform token Vip.
*You need to stake 100HT equivalent LP Tokens to enjoy part of EVip extra rewards.
ToggleExpertTip: Bypasses confirmation modals and allows high slippage trades. Use at your own risk.
SureExpertModeTip:
Expert mode turns off the confirm transaction prompt and allows high slippage trades that often result
in bad rates and lost funds.
ConfirmExpertMode: Please type the word "confirm" to enable expert mode.
createNVipSwapTip: Create your NVip to generate an invitation link or view your NVip details.
InviteTip: Create to generate an invitation link or view your invitation details.
createEVipSwapTip: Click to create & join a EVip or check your EVip.
eVipSwapHelp:
1. Taking part in liquidity mining
 2.UBI Rewards
 3.Extra Liquidity Mining Rewards
SlippageToleranceTip: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
TransactionDeadlineTip: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this long.
Liquidity provider rewards tip: Liquidity providers earn a 0.3% fee on all trades proportional to their share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.
ViewLiquidityTip: Connect to a wallet to view your liquidity.
MigrateImportTip2: Don't see a pool you joined?
AddLiquidityTip: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
RemovingPool: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.
AddingLiquidityTip:
By adding liquidity you'll earn 0.3% of all trades on this pair proportional to your share of the pool.
Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.
AirdropConditions_1st: Create LPs on VipSwap by January 26th and receive airdrops based on time weight, money weight, and referral weight and referral weights.
NVipTipsContent:
direct recommendation coefficient 0.5; indirect recommendation coefficient is 0.25;

 For example: There are three users A, B, and C in the fund pool, and they added fund pool weights are 100, 200, and 300 respectively.  

Their relationship is A invited B, B invited C:
 A's weight = 100 + 200*0.5 + 300*0.25=275
 B's weight = 200 + 300 * 0.5 = 350
 C's weight = 300

 Total weight = 100 + 200*0.5 + 300*0.25 + 200 + 300*0.5 + 300 = 925

 The number of airdrops user get= the total number of airdrops each time * (their own weight / total weight)
AirdropContent_4: According to the block, every 200 blocks will generate-airdrops, which will be sent to the addresses (viewable but not extractable)
AirdropContent_5:
the Direct recommendation coefficient is 0.5; the Indirect recommendation coefficient is 0.25; that is, if a user adds a fund pool, his direct recommender will receive an additional 50% weight of the added funds, and his indirect recommender will receive an additional 25% weight of the added funds;
For example: There are A, B, and C in the fund pool, and the added fund pool weight is 100, 200, and 300 respectively. 
The recommended relationship is A=>B=>C
The weight of A=100+200*0.5+300*0.25=275
The weight of B=200+300*0.5=350
The weight of C = 300
Total weight=100+200*0.5+300*0.25+200+300*0.5+300=925 
Everyone gets the number of airdrops = the total number of airdrops each time * their total weight/total weight
